description: You'll love everything about this healthier roast chicken dinner – it's easy to cook, is full of flavour, and there's next to no washing up.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Healthier One-Pot Chicken With Roast Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 Macro Organic lemons (save 1, halved, to serve )
0.25 cup Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
1 head Macro Organic garlic, halved crossways
3 small Macro Organic brown onions, halved
1 large Macro Organic zucchini, roughly chopped
4 Macro Organic sebago potatoes, peeled, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Finely grate zest from 1 lemon, then juice both lemons, reserving lemon halves. Remove leaves from half of the thyme. Combine oil, thyme leaves, lemon juice and zest in a small bowl. Place 2 reserved lemon halves and three-quarters of the remaining thyme in chicken cavity. Tie legs together with unwaxed kitchen string and tuck wings under chicken.

Place vegetables and remaining reserved lemon halves in a large baking dish. Drizzle with half of the oil mixture and toss to coat. Place chicken on top of vegetables and brush with remaining oil mixture.

Roast for 50 minutes or until browned and until juices run clear when thickest part of thigh is pierced with a skewer. Cover loosely with foil. Set aside for 15 minutes to rest. Serve with remaining thyme sprigs and extra lemon halves.
